video_prompt: Start with the woman's hair and flowers gently swaying. Her eyes subtly express emotion. The background ribbons gracefully undulate and shift colors, with stars twinkling. Her lips slightly part, then close. The earrings gently sway.
image_prompt: Anime style, vertical image of a young woman with fair skin, pink blush, and shoulder-length pink hair with bangs. Her hair is adorned with colorful cartoon flowers. She has striking gold and blue eyes with black pupils, long eyelashes, and defined eyebrows. Her lips are full and pink, slightly parted. She wears pearl drop earrings with flower accents. The background features dreamy, rainbow-colored ribbons (yellow, orange, red, pink, dark blue, light blue, green) encircling her head and neck, embellished with small white stars. The style combines watercolor and digital art with soft blends and clear outlines. Subtle signature "c29" in the bottom right.
refined_video_prompt: Hair and flowers gently sway. Her gaze subtly shifts with emerging emotion. Background ribbons gracefully undulate, their colors transforming. Stars twinkle. Lips part, then close. Earrings gently sway.
